author: fabiocos
body:
This PR is meant to synchronize the 9_4_X branch with the 9_4_MAOD_X (at the CMSSW_9_4_5_cand1 build moment) plus following additions in 9_4_AN_X needing the MAOD software (#22728 and #22753). 

The synchronization should happen when CMSSW_9_4_5_cand1 is declared as validated and rady for production. Alternatively this PR will have to be updated with appropriate fixes.
title: Backport of CMSSW_9_4_5_cand1 + additions in 9_4_AN_X into 9_4_X
